Code preview of 定时表JBPM4_JOB

drop index IDX_JOBDUEDATE on JBPM4_JOB;

drop index IDX_JOBLOCKEXP on JBPM4_JOB;

drop index IDX_JOB_EXE on JBPM4_JOB;

drop index IDX_JOB_PRINST on JBPM4_JOB;

drop index IDX_JOB_CFG on JBPM4_JOB;

drop index IDX_JOBRETRIES on JBPM4_JOB;

drop table if exists JBPM4_JOB;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: JBPM4_JOB */
/*==============================================================*/
create table JBPM4_JOB
(
DBID_ bigint not null,
CLASS_ varchar(255) not null,
DBVERSION_ integer not null,
DUEDATE_ datetime,
STATE_ varchar(255),
ISEXCLUSIVE_ bit,
LOCKOWNER_ varchar(255),
LOCKEXPTIME_ datetime,
EXCEPTION_ longtext,
RETRIES_ integer,
PROCESSINSTANCE_ bigint,
EXECUTION_ bigint,
CFG_ bigint,
SIGNAL_ varchar(255),
EVENT_ varchar(255),
REPEAT_ varchar(255),
INDEX FK_JOB_CFG (CFG_),
primary key (DBID_)
)
type=InnoDB;

alter table JBPM4_JOB comment '定时表
';

(

);

);
